summary: Sophie "inherits" her uncle's preserved whale and finds out that whoever sleeps in the whale's belly with her will be granted one wish. That causes chaos and hatred in the village.
cast: Maria Schrader|Eva Herzig|Andreas Lust|Georges Kern|August Schmölzer|Karl Merkatz|Bibiane Zeller|Rudolf Wessely|Manuel Löffler|Erwin Leder|Hannes Fretzer|Rainer Egger|Heinrich Schweiger|Gabriela Schmoll|Johannes Zeiler|Beatrice Frey|Gerhard Rühmkorf|Michou Friesz|Haymon Maria Buttinger|Theo Schenk|Heinz Wustinger|Rudolf Knor|Mathias Kahler|Daniela Gäts|Mátyás Dráfi|Hanna Held|Manfred Schauer|Michael Köhlmeier|Karl Künstler
title: Der Unfisch
